html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2014-11212014-10-23,  ,  TC,  PPA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActPilotage Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Pacific Pilotage Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the PACIFIC PILOTAGE REGULATIONS in order to (1) meet the Authority’s mandate of providing a safe and efficient marine pilotage service on the Pacific coast of Canada; (2) ensure accurate references to the General Pilotage Regulations in the Regulations; (3) rectify the geo-reference found in section 3 and add the term “licensed pilot” in section 29; and (4) improve the billing system.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2014-0240 Publication Date: 2014-11-05
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Pacific Pilotage Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the PACIFIC PILOTAGE REGULATIONS in order to (1) meet the Authority’s mandate of providing a safe and efficient marine pilotage service on the Pacific coast of Canada; (2) ensure accurate references to the General Pilotage Regulations in the Regulations; (3) rectify the geo-reference found in section 3 and add the term “licensed pilot” in section 29; and (4) improve the billing system.
